measure.name: residential_hot_water_heater_tankless
measure.description: This measure adds a new residential tankless water heater to the model based on user inputs. If there is already an existing residential water heater in the model, it is replaced. For multifamily buildings, the water heater can be set for all units of the building. See https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio-BuildStock#workflows for supported workflows using this measure.
measure.modeler_description: The measure will create a new instance of the OS:WaterHeater:Mixed object representing a tankless water heater. The water heater will be placed on the plant loop 'Domestic Hot Water Loop'. If this loop already exists, any water heater on that loop will be removed and replaced with a water heater consistent with this measure. If it doesn't exist, it will be created.

argument.name: fuel_type
argument.description: Type of fuel used for water heating.

argument.name: setpoint_type
argument.description: The water heater setpoint type. The 'constant' option will use a constant value for the whole year, while 'scheduled' will use 8760 values in a schedule file.

argument.name: setpoint_temp
argument.description: Water heater setpoint temperature. This value will be ignored if the setpoint type is Scheduled.

argument.name: schedules_directory
argument.display_name: Setpoint and Operating Mode Schedule Directory
argument.description: Absolute (or relative) directory to schedule files. This argument will be ignored if a constant setpoint type is used instead.

argument.name: setpoint_schedule
argument.description: Name of the hourly setpoint schedule. Setpoint should be defined (in F) for every hour. The operating mode schedule must also be located in the same location.

argument.name: location
argument.description: The space type for the location. 'auto' will automatically choose a space type based on the space types found in the model.

argument.name: capacity
argument.description: The maximum energy input rating of the water heater.

argument.name: energy_factor
argument.description: Ratio of useful energy output from the water heater to the total amount of energy delivered from the water heater.

argument.name: cycling_derate
argument.description: Annual energy derate for cycling inefficiencies -- accounts for the impact of thermal cycling and small hot water draws on the heat exchanger. CEC's 2008 Title24 implemented an 8% derate for tankless water heaters.

argument.name: offcyc_power
argument.description: Off cycle electric power draw for controls, etc. Only used for non-electric water heaters.

argument.name: oncyc_power
argument.description: On cycle electric power draw from the forced draft fan motor. Only used for non-electric water heaters.

argument.name: has_water_heater_flue
argument.display_name: Air Leakage: Has Open Water Heater Flue
argument.description: Specifies whether the building has an open flue associated with the water heater.
